item.title: You Won't Believe What Happened When We Tried Playing This 'Beauty and the Beast' Sheet Music!
item.description: Introduction We recently tried our hand at playing some “Beauty and the Beast” sheet music, and it was an experience that we won’t soon forget! This beloved Disney classic has been a favorite of ours since we were children, and we were excited to try our hand at playing the iconic music Background of “Beauty and the Beast” “Beauty and the Beast” is a classic Disney animated musical that was released in 11.
